name: RGB Backfire!
description:
A short, arcade-like shooter where your attacks fall onto you. Attack carefully, and rotate carefully!

Bullets have colors. The color of the bullet means that it can be absorbed by objects of the same color.

If the game is too easy for you, try speedrunning! Your score will increase if you finish more quickly. Please tell me your records in the comments below!

Controls
  • Q/W/E: Change color to red / green / blue.
  • Mouse: Move to aim. Left click to fire.
  • Esc (Escape): Quit game.
